alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Carlton; Itasca; Pine; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:49AM CDT until May 30 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Itasca County in north central Minnesota... Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... Pine County in east central Minnesota... Southwestern St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... Western Douglas County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 548 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Swatara, to near Tamarack, to 6 miles west of Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tamarack around 555 AM CDT. Duxbury around 600 AM CDT. Cromwell and Cloverton around 605 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Floodwood, Warba, Gunn, Taconite, Foxboro, Keewatin, Nashwauk, Meadowlands and Pengilly. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Aitkin; Carlton; Itasca; Pine; St. Louis
